name: DailySignal
text:
Only in North Carolina have police confirmed arrests in connection with vandalism and destruction of property.

Why aren't there more arrests associated with the destruction of statues across the U.S.? https://t.co/P7uHJYm3FT

name: DailySignal
text: RT @PoliticalShort: "It comes as no surprise that the people behind the 1619 Project are ‘honored’ by mob violence carried out under their banner." https://t.co/ecsk6cYJ3r
